mapper.sql: id, C_DistrictBCDId, C_AddressId, C_ChannelId, C_FaultId, C_FrameCmdId, i, C_RecordInsertTime, occurTime
mapper.insert:
insert into t_short_i
id,
C_DistrictBCDId,
C_AddressId,
C_ChannelId,
C_FaultId,
C_FrameCmdId,
i,
C_RecordInsertTime,
occurTime,

mapper.update:
update t_short_i
C_DistrictBCDId = #{cDistrictbcdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_AddressId = #{cAddressid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
C_ChannelId = #{cChannelid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
C_FaultId = #{cFaultid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
C_FrameCmdId = #{cFramecmdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
i = #{i,jdbcType=REAL},
C_RecordInsertTime = #{cRecordinserttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
occurTime = #{occurtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_short_i set C_DistrictBCDId = #{cDistrictbcdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_AddressId = #{cAddressid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, C_ChannelId = #{cChannelid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, C_FaultId = #{cFaultid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, C_FrameCmdId = #{cFramecmdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, i = #{i,jdbcType=REAL}, C_RecordInsertTime = #{cRecordinserttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, occurTime = #{occurtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT id, C_DistrictBCDId, C_AddressId, C_ChannelId, C_FrameCmdId, i, from_unixtime(unix_timestamp(C_RecordInsertTime),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%I:%S') AS strCRecordinserttime, from_unixtime(unix_timestamp(occurTime),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%I:%S') AS strOccurTime, C_FaultId FROM t_short_i WHERE 1 = 1 ${paramSQL} ORDER BY occurTime DESC
